markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channel Rot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3527) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Prerequisites**
[Accursed Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=3525)

</column>

---

You've learned to channel your curse through weapons you wield instead of solely through your flesh. The benefits of Accursed Touch apply to any melee weapon you wield instead of only your fist Strikes.
name: Channel Rot
